h2_title: Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide
content: Two other attacks happen less frequently, but go on for longer and can be more dangerous. The first one is that now and then, he'll flash gold and your attacks will repel.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Stone Monkey Phase One'.
The content is as follows:
Two other attacks happen less frequently, but go on for longer and can be more dangerous. The first one is that now and then, he'll flash gold and your attacks will repel.
